Post-Match Reflections: Jimmy Butler commented that he doesn't have any joy playing for the Heat anymore.
Heat president Pat Riley stated they won't trade Jimmy Butler.
There's still a non-zero chance the Heat might move Butler before the Feb. 6 trade deadline.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Miami Heat lost to the Indiana Pacers with a final score of 128-115.
Jimmy Butler returned after a 13-day absence with an illness and scored just nine points in both games.
Butler is averaging career-best stats despite the team's poor performance.
